column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The BEST ramen spot in Houston. Really nice ambience. Amazing ramen
column2: and even better when you ask them to make it spicy! Vegetarian and vegan options as well. The vegan creamy ramen is amazing -- even if you're not vegan you should try it! I would highly recommend the shrimp tempura with spicy mayo as well. The service is very good.
